item.title: Unifi Controller on K3s
item.description: Goal: Run the unifi controller as container on my home K3s cluster. Introduction The synology D916+ can run a docker application packed in a single container, which I found quite convenient to host a couple of applications in my home network: The unifi controller, to manage our two Unifi Access Points The Logitech Media Server - yes, I still own several squeezeboxes I wouldn’t change for anything :D Home Assistant Planning to add further applications - and having in mind a setup where the logs from some of the home applications are fed into a elasticsearch cluster later - I decided to move them to Kubernetes, which it meant to reactivate my K3s cluster, which I had installed on a Raspberry Pi 4 a while ago - see my previous post:
